post_detail.description:
To convince Comedy Central to bring this show from pilot to series, the Click 3X team not only edited the pilot, but created both the show's graphics package, as well as segment specific animations.
For the graphics package our team worked in Maya, C4D, AE, and Flame.   Maya and C4D were used as design/modeling/3d animating tools, with AE being a finishing tool, and Flame used for Roto, CC, and screen replacement. This package included the show open, bumps, transitions, and segment specific titles.
